channel.title: Pages on Yuki Terasaka's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Pages on Yuki Terasaka's blog

item.title: About
item.description: About Me Hello! I’m a front-end web developer with a background in fine arts. In university, I majored in art, focusing on creating works using photography. The creativity and aesthetic sense I developed during that time have been incredibly valuable in my current role. After graduation, I worked as a freelance Japanese-German translator. My passion for technology eventually led me to self-study programming, and in 2023, I started my career as a web developer.
